description: Converts an AFNI dataset to a NIfTI-1.1 file.

verbose.title: Verbose
verbose.description: Print progress messages (increases verbosity if repeated)

force_float.title: Force Float
force_float.description: Force the output dataset to be 32-bit floats

pure.title: Pure
pure.description: Do not write an AFNI extension field into the output file

denote.title: Denote
denote.description: Remove text notes from AFNI extension field that might contain identifying information

oldid.title: Old ID
oldid.description: Retain the input dataset's AFNI ID code

newid.title: New ID
newid.description: Assign a new AFNI ID code to the dataset (default action)
